CamCapture.MainDesc: When CamCapture is connected to a CamResource it will take a picture and store it when ever it is called. CamCapture will be shown on the HMI Window.
CamCapture.Coordinates: Coordinates of the element on the HMI Window
CamCapture.Title: Title of the element on the HMI Window
CamCapture.Picture: Attribute with the taken picture of the CamCapture. When no picture has been taken, the ReferencePicture of the CamResource is being shown.
